articles.title: Rhino killings on the rise in SA, says environment minister - News24
articles.description: At least 249 rhinos were killed in the first six months of this year in South Africa, Environment Minister Barbara Creecy has said, partly pushed by the easing of lockdown curbs that increased the movement of poachers.
articles.content:
• More rhinos have been killed this year compared to the same time in 2020.
  • Most of the killings happened in the Kruger National Park this year.
